thread.section_title: Les Tournelles - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Incredible Location
thread.title_full: Incredible Location - Review of Les Tournelles, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Andrew M
title: Incredible Location
text:
Les Tournelles is located in the heart of Le Marais district and it is close to everything - Place de Vosges, metro station, bus stops, parks, cafes and restaurants surround the hotel. The hotel is very clean, well decorated, and gives off a boho vibe throughout. Next to the reception, they have a lounge with an "honesty bar" and chic decor. With a classy and minimalistic approach to design coupled with unparalleled customer service, Les Tournelles is exactly the perfect combination of staying in a big city while feeling right at home. Compliments to all of the staff who are discreet yet extremely professional in servicing their clients and anticipating their every needs.
Thank you so much for having us!
